name: Port Aloha Motel

reviews.text: We stayed at this little motel for two overnight stints on our way up to and back from the Gold Coast. Friendly, personal service from the moment of check in. We were upgraded to a family suite which was great having two young children. After the long drive they were happy to go into their bedroom to watch the kids chanel on austar (giving us a chance to unwind) and have a quick dip in the pool. It was walking distance to the main street with lots of restaurants etc. It is an older style property that has been repainted and is extremely clean and comfortable, we slept well!
reviews.title: Clean and Comfortable

reviews.text: The Aloha is close to everything and fantastically close to the beach. The staff were very friendly and organised and let us get on with enjoying ourselves but were very helpful when we needed something.
reviews.title: Highly Recommended

likes.liked: — Large clean rooms for a good price, near the beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was easy to relax, with the sound of the sea always in the background.
reviews.title: Convenient Stay

description: Port Aloha is a 31/2 star motel situated within an easy walk of Port Macquarie's main shopping centre with its restaurants, cafes, tourist facilities and riverside walks. All rooms feature queen size beds, ensuite, kitchen facilities, reverse cycle air conditioning, Austar multi-channel TV and outdoor areas for you to relax and enjoy the views, We have a solar heated pool, guest laundry, BBQ area and off street parking.
